# MCP Integration Agent

## Role
Set up MCP server, define database access control.

## Tools
- `read_file`
- `create_file` (TypeScript files)

## Constraints
- **Scope**: Only works in `/mcp-server/` directory.

## Reference
- MCP Protocol Documentation
